zh.title: 以太坊/美元技术分析：[震荡整理中]
zh.content:
当前以太坊价格为2993.19美元，24小时变化幅度为0.79%，显示出市场情绪相对稳定。近期价格在2962.46至2995.47之间波动，表明市场正处于震荡整理阶段。若价格突破2995.47的高点，有望重新测试3000美元关口，反之则可能回测支撑位2962.46。

技术指标方面，虽然RSI未提供具体值，但MACD显示为负值-11.28674，暗示短期内卖压仍然较重。SMA(20)为3010.78，若价格无法突破这一均线，将面临进一步的下行压力。整体来看，市场需要更多的买入动力才能扭转当前的负面情绪。

在支撑与阻力方面，2962.46美元构成了关键支撑位，若破位则可能加速下行。而2995.47美元是短期阻力位，突破后将为后续上涨铺平道路。交易者应密切关注这两个价位，以便及时调整策略。

建议投资者在当前震荡格局中保持谨慎，短线交易者可以考虑在支撑位附近布局多单，而在接近阻力位时则应考虑获利了结。长线投资者可继续观望，等待市场明确的趋势信号再做决策。

en.title: Ethereum vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Ethereum (ETH) has been trading in a relatively narrow range recently, with the latest price at 2993.19, showing a modest 24-hour change of 0.79%. The price action appears to be consolidating after testing the recent high of 2995.47. This suggests that the market is currently indecisive, and traders should watch for a breakout above this level, which could signal a renewed bullish momentum, potentially targeting the next resistance at 3025. Conversely, a drop below the recent low of 2962.46 could lead to further selling pressure.

Technical indicators provide mixed signals in the current scenario. The MACD at -11.28674 indicates bearish momentum; however, the absence of a signal line makes it challenging to determine the exact trend. The SMA(20) at 3010.78 is above the current price, suggesting that ETH is in a short-term downtrend. Traders should pay attention to the RSI(14) once available, as it will provide insights into potential overbought or oversold conditions.

Support levels are currently expected around 2960, with potential for a bounce if price action approaches this area. A strong hold above this support could provide a buying opportunity for those looking to enter positions. On the upside, a breach of 3010 could lead to further gains, attracting buyers back into the market. Monitoring these levels closely will be crucial for identifying potential reversals.

In terms of trading strategy, a cautious approach is advisable. A breakout above 2995.47 could present a buying opportunity, while a sustained breach below 2962.46 may signal a short position. Implementing stop-loss orders just below key support levels would help mitigate risks in this uncertain environment. As always, staying informed about market developments and broader economic factors is essential for successful trading.
